VCS uses this information only to scale technical implementation to match our audience's browser capabilities.
When you enter our website we can determine your domain name and what browser and operating system you are using, but we cannot determine any personal information about you.
When requesting information from us, or entering secure areas of our website, we do require that you provide some information about yourself by "registering" or completing an online form.
This allows us to provide information that will meet your needs and make your experience easier.
Some portions of the site may require you to give us personal information, which enables us to identify you, such as your name, email or other address.
